price: دوى هماغه خلك دي چې الله رټلي دي، او هغه چې الله رټلي نو څوك ملاتړى به يې ونه مومې.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَن يَلۡعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu waman yalʿani al-lahu falan tajida lahu naṣīran
